title: Did US Rep. Wear ‘Kill ‘Em All’ Shirt to GOP Event?
subtitle: The communications director for the Colorado Republican Party told Snopes the saying is well-known as being associated with the U.S. Marines.
author: Madison Dapcevich
vclaim: U.S. Rep. Ken Buck, a Republican from Colorado, attended a campaign rally wearing a T-shirt that read, “Kill ‘Em All. Let God Sort ‘Em Out.”
